ModMetaData.name: Mod Options Sort
ModMetaData.author: Superniquito
ModMetaData.description:
Sorts and groups the mod options tab by author if there is more than one mod by the same author, otherwise groups them in the Various Authors group, special groups for VE mods and mods with configs created via HugsLib. Makes the search bar work by author too. Can be toggled. [b]Fixes the HugsLib search bar error.[/b]
